messages.body: Hey team! Mia just shared the Aurora mockups. They look amazing. Let's review before the design meeting Tuesday.
Just looked through them - the drag-and-drop widget approach is really clean. I think we can leverage the existing React DnD library for that. Should be straightforward.
Thanks Emily! I designed the grid system with 12-column breakpoints so it maps well to a component-based layout. Happy to walk through the interaction specs.
Great collaboration you two. @Liam, can you make sure we have story points estimated for the frontend work before sprint planning Monday?
Will do. I'll break it into epics: widget framework, chart components, real-time data layer, and settings/preferences.
Migration plan for AKS is shared in the Engineering folder. @David, can you review the CosmosDB connection string migration section? Want to make sure the failover logic is right.
Looking at it now. One thing - we should use managed identity instead of connection strings for the new cluster. I'll update the Terraform configs.
Good call David. I've already set up the managed identity in Azure AD for the staging subscription. I'll send you the resource IDs.
Perfect teamwork ðŸŽ‰ Updated the plan to reflect managed identity approach. The staging migration window is confirmed for Jan 20-24. I'll send a calendar invite.
James, just got off the call with Contoso. They're in! 200 seats. ðŸŽ‰
That's incredible Ryan!! Best news all week. Can you send me the details over email so I can loop in Sarah and Marcus?
Sending now. They need SSO scoping and a data residency conversation. I told them we'd get back to them by end of next week.
Heads up team - just sent the Q4 security audit findings via email. Three items need attention within 14 days. Most critical: npm CVEs in the frontend build.
I saw the report. Two of the three CVEs are in transitive dependencies. I can bump the parent packages and run the test suite today.
I'll handle the TLS 1.0 deprecation on the legacy gateway. Should be a config change + testing. @Noah, can you verify from the network side after I push?
Absolutely. I'll set up the TLS scanner to validate. For the service account permissions, I can tighten those in Azure AD this afternoon - just need Marcus to approve the scope changes.
Approved. Go ahead Noah. And let's add the security items to sprint 25 backlog. @Liam can you create the tickets?
Mia, the mockups look fantastic! Quick question - did we consider the accessibility requirements for the color contrast in dark mode?
Yes! All color combinations meet WCAG 2.1 AA standards. I used the Figma contrast checker plugin. I'll add the accessibility notes to the design spec doc.
Perfect. Let's make sure Emily knows about the ARIA roles needed for the drag-and-drop. Great work!
Blog post draft is out for review. @James and @Sarah have it. Targeting Jan 15th publish date.
Great timing Olivia. Also - Fabrikam wants to do a joint webinar Feb 12th. Can you start planning the logistics?
On it! I'll draft a landing page and promotional email sequence. We should aim for 200+ registrations. Ryan, can you share the Contoso win as a case study teaser?
Definitely! Once the deal is signed I'll get a quote from their CTO. Should make great social proof.
Hey, did either of you see the Python SDK beta results? 9 out of 12 rated DX as excellent or good!
That's awesome David! The auth token refresh bugs - are those in the same area I refactored last sprint?
Different code path actually. It's the background renewal timer in the async client. I have a fix ready, just need to add retry logic.
Nice work both of you! David, make sure the fix goes through the security scan pipeline before merging. Noah flagged some dependency issues yesterday.
